sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [SalesOrderID]
      ,[SalesOrderDetailID]
      ,[CarrierTrackingNumber]
      ,[OrderQty]
      ,[ProductNumber]
      ,[ProductID]
      ,[UnitPrice]
      ,[UnitPriceDiscount]
      ,[TotalAmount]
      ,[OrderDate]
      ,[DueDate]
      ,[ShipDate]
      ,[OrderMode]
      ,[CustomerNumber]
      ,[TerriorityName]
      ,[ModifiedDate]
  FROM [salesdata].[@{activity('lkp_get_details').output.firstrow.SourceViewName}]
  WHERE CAST(ModifiedDate AS date) >= CAST('@{activity('lkp_get_lastupdatedate').output.firstrow.LastUpdateDate}' AS date)

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TOP 1 MAX(LastUpdatedDate) AS LastUpdatedDate FROM [Reporting].[FactSales]
SELECT TOP 1 MAX(LastUpdatedDate) AS LastUpdatedDate FROM [Reporting].[FactSales]
